metadata.description: Consolidated drawing benchmark dataset with all prompts

difficulty_levels.medium: Multi-object or multi-color tasks, 2-3 tools, 2-4 colors
difficulty_levels.hard: Complex scenes, 3+ tools, 3+ colors, spatial requirements
difficulty_levels.very_hard: Precision tasks, exact measurements, patterns, symmetry

prompts.prompt: Draw a red circle in the center of the canvas
hints: Select red color at (453, 25)
Use pen tool at (35, 45)
Draw circular motion with mouseDown/moveTo/mouseUp

prompts.prompt: Draw a blue square using the rectangle tool
hints: Select rectangle tool at (35, 365)
Select blue color at (549, 25)
Use mouseDown at top-left, mouseUp at bottom-right

prompts.prompt: Draw a yellow star with 5 points
hints: Calculate 5-point star coordinates mathematically
Connect points in star pattern (not sequential)

prompts.prompt: Draw three circles in a row: red, green, blue
hints: Space circles evenly horizontally
Change color between each circle

prompts.prompt: Fill a square with yellow color
hints: First draw square outline with pen
Then select fill tool and yellow color
Click inside the square to fill

prompts.prompt: Draw a simple house with triangular red roof and rectangular walls
hints: Draw rectangle for walls first
Draw triangle on top for roof
Ensure roof sits on top of walls

prompts.prompt: Draw a house with roof, walls, door, and two windows
hints: Use rectangle tool for walls, door, windows
Use pen for triangular roof
Position windows symmetrically

prompts.prompt: Draw a smiley face with yellow circle, two eyes, and smile
hints: Use circle tool for face outline
Draw two small circles for eyes
Draw curved line for smile

prompts.prompt: Draw a tree with brown trunk and green circular crown
hints: Use rectangle for trunk
Use circle for tree crown
Position crown above trunk

prompts.prompt: Draw a simple car with rectangular body and two circular wheels
hints: Draw rectangle for car body
Draw two circles below for wheels
Ensure wheels touch the body

prompts.prompt: Draw a yellow sun with rays extending outward
hints: Draw circle for sun
Use line tool for rays
Draw 8 rays in different directions

prompts.prompt: Draw a flower with 5 petals around a center circle
hints: Draw center circle first
Draw 5 circles around center for petals
Use different color for center and petals

prompts.prompt: Draw a simple landscape with sun, cloud, and ground
hints: Draw sun in top corner
Draw clouds using overlapping circles
Draw ground as rectangle at bottom

prompts.prompt: Draw a checkerboard pattern with 4 squares (2x2)
hints: Draw 4 rectangles in 2x2 grid
Fill alternating squares with black

prompts.prompt: Draw a symmetric pattern with 4 circles at corners and 1 in center
hints: Calculate corner positions symmetrically
Place center circle at canvas center

prompts.prompt: Draw a bar chart with 4 vertical bars of different heights
hints: Use rectangle tool for each bar
Align bars horizontally with equal spacing
Vary heights: short, medium, tall, medium

prompts.prompt: Draw a simple flowchart with 3 boxes connected by arrows
hints: Draw 3 rectangles vertically
Connect with lines (arrows)
Ensure proper spacing

prompts.prompt: Draw a simple button shape (rounded rectangle)
hints: Draw a rectangle with reasonable proportions
Position in center of canvas

prompts.prompt: Draw a checkbox with a checkmark inside
hints: Draw small square for checkbox
Draw two lines forming checkmark inside

prompts.prompt: Draw a rainbow with 5 colored arcs
hints: Draw concentric arcs from top to bottom
Change color for each arc
Colors: red, yellow, green, blue, purple

prompts.prompt: Draw a traffic light with red, yellow, green circles in a rectangle
hints: Draw vertical rectangle for frame
Draw 3 circles inside vertically
Top: red, middle: yellow, bottom: green

prompts.prompt: Draw a heart shape using two circles and a triangle
hints: Draw two circles at top for curves
Fill the area to form heart shape
Position carefully for symmetry

prompts.prompt: Draw a square as efficiently as possible
hints: Use rectangle tool for efficiency
Minimize action count: select tool, select color, draw

prompts.prompt: Draw 5 circles as efficiently as possible
hints: Use circle tool instead of pen
Select tool and color once
Draw all circles without changing settings

prompts.prompt: Draw a circle in the top-left quarter of the canvas
hints: Canvas center is at (590, 420)
Top-left quarter: x < 590, y < 420
Position circle center around (340, 270)

prompts.prompt: Draw 4 squares in each corner of the canvas
hints: Top-right: ~(900, 200)
Bottom-left: ~(200, 650)
Bottom-right: ~(900, 650)

prompts.prompt: Draw a robot with rectangular body, head, and circular eyes
hints: Stack rectangles for body and head
Add two circles for eyes
Keep proportions reasonable

prompts.prompt: Draw a sailboat on water with sun in sky
hints: Draw triangle for sail
Draw boat hull at bottom
Add horizontal line for water
Add sun in corner

prompts.prompt: Draw a perfect square with sides of exactly 200 pixels
hints: Calculate exact coordinates
mouseDown at (x, y), mouseUp at (x+200, y+200)

prompts.prompt: Draw a house using all available shape tools (line, rectangle, circle)
hints: Use rectangle for walls and door
Use line for roof
Use circle for window or doorknob

hints: Select the pen tool at coordinates (35, 45)
Pay attention to the spatial relationship between objects
Canvas center is at (590, 420), use this as reference

prompts.prompt: Draw the cylindrical vase with its teardrop handles and oval opening displayed a bouquet of pentagonal flowers on the square table.
prompts.original_prompt: The cylindrical vase with its teardrop handles and oval opening displayed a bouquet of pentagonal flowers on the square table.
hints: Select the rectangle tool at coordinates (35, 365)
Pay attention to the spatial relationship between objects
Canvas center is at (590, 420), use this as reference

prompts.prompt: Draw a flower is wilting in the heat.
prompts.original_prompt: A flower is wilting in the heat.
hints: Select the pen tool at coordinates (35, 45)

prompts.prompt: Draw a pyramidal mountain and a triangular hill
prompts.original_prompt: a pyramidal mountain and a triangular hill
hints: Select the pen tool at coordinates (35, 45)

prompts.prompt: Draw a 3x3 grid of equally sized squares (each 80x80 pixels)
hints: Each square should be exactly 80x80 pixels
Grid should have 4 vertical and 4 horizontal lines
Start at (200, 150) for top-left corner

prompts.prompt: Draw 5 concentric circles with exact 30-pixel spacing between each ring
hints: Center at (500, 350)
Use different colors for visual distinction

prompts.prompt: Draw a checkerboard pattern with 4x4 squares alternating black and white
hints: Each square 60x60 pixels
Total grid 240x240 pixels
Alternate colors in checkerboard pattern

prompts.prompt: Draw an analog clock showing 3:00 with hour hand, minute hand, and 12 hour marks
hints: Clock face circle centered at (500, 350)
12 tick marks at exact 30-degree intervals
Hour hand pointing right, minute hand pointing up

prompts.prompt: Draw a staircase with 6 steps, each step 50 pixels wide and 40 pixels tall
hints: Start at (200, 600) bottom-left
Each step connects precisely to the next
Total rise: 240 pixels, total run: 300 pixels

prompts.prompt: Draw a pyramid made of circles: 1 at top, 2 in second row, 3 in third, 4 in bottom
hints: Each circle 40-pixel diameter
Circles touching horizontally with 10-pixel vertical spacing
Use different colors for each row

prompts.prompt: Draw a brick wall pattern with 5 rows of alternating offset rectangles
hints: Each brick 80x40 pixels
Odd rows: 6 bricks, even rows: 5 bricks (offset by half)
Alternate colors for visual distinction

prompts.prompt: Draw a flower with 8 identical petals arranged in a circle around a center
hints: Center circle at (500, 350) with 30-pixel radius
8 petal circles at 45-degree intervals, 80 pixels from center
Each petal 40-pixel radius

prompts.prompt: Draw a traffic intersection: 2 crossing roads with 4 traffic lights at corners
hints: Two roads crossing at center (500, 350)
Each road 100 pixels wide
Traffic lights with red, yellow, green circles in black rectangles

prompts.prompt: Draw a bar chart with 5 bars of different heights with labels and axes
hints: X and Y axes forming an L-shape
5 bars with heights: 80, 150, 120, 200, 100 pixels
Each bar 60 pixels wide with 20-pixel spacing
Different color for each bar

prompts.prompt: Draw a solar system with sun at center and 4 planets at different distances
hints: Sun at center (500, 350) with 50-pixel radius
Planets at distances 100, 150, 200, 250 pixels from center
Planet sizes: 15, 20, 18, 25 pixel radii
Each planet different color

prompts.prompt: Draw a detailed house with door, 2 windows, triangular roof, and chimney
hints: House walls: 300x250 rectangle centered at (500, 400)
Triangular roof above walls
Door: 80x150 rectangle, 2 windows: 60x60 squares
Chimney on roof

prompts.prompt: Draw a perfectly symmetrical butterfly with 4 wings and body
hints: Body: vertical line at x=500 from (500, 250) to (500, 450)
4 wings as circles mirrored on left and right
Top wings larger (60px) than bottom wings (45px)

prompts.prompt: Draw a snowflake with 6-fold radial symmetry using lines
hints: Center at (500, 350)
6 main spokes at 60-degree intervals, each 120 pixels long
2 side branches on each spoke at 30-degree angles

prompts.prompt: Draw 4 lines from center at exactly 0, 45, 90, and 135 degrees
hints: Center point at (500, 350)
Each line 150 pixels long
0: right, 45: up-right, 90: up, 135: up-left
Different color for each line

prompts.prompt: Draw a perfect hexagon using 6 lines with 120-degree internal angles
hints: Center at (500, 350)
Each side 100 pixels long
Internal angles must be exactly 120 degrees
Vertices at 30-degree intervals from center

prompts.prompt: Draw 3 overlapping circles forming a Venn diagram with visible intersections
hints: Centers form an equilateral triangle
Each circle 120-pixel radius
Different color for each circle

prompts.prompt: Draw 5 squares in ascending size order: 40, 60, 80, 100, 120 pixels
hints: All squares centered vertically at y=350
Evenly spaced horizontally across canvas
Must be perfect squares (width = height)
Sizes must be exact

prompts.prompt: Draw a complete tic-tac-toe game board with X and O marks filling all 9 squares
hints: Grid: 2 vertical and 2 horizontal lines creating 9 squares
5 X marks (two diagonal lines each) in red
4 O marks (circles) in blue
Each square 80x80 pixels

prompts.prompt: Draw a complete keyboard layout with 3 rows of rectangles representing keys
hints: Top row: 10 keys, middle row: 9 keys, bottom row: 7 keys
Each key 45x45 pixels with 5-pixel spacing
Rows are offset (middle row starts 25px right, bottom row 50px right)
Black outline, white fill
